Message.Title: Friday night after Friday night, up here all alone spewing HATE.
Message.Msg: Sad. Perpetual, chosen......loneliness. We can only try to help so many times....... -Sully Rules

Topic.Title: Up So Early On Saturday Morning Spewing Hate.

Message.Msg: Your "team" is losing it, spewing puke in the wee hours of the morning, all over fake sullied's major ID fail. Melt all weekend as I command you. What pathetic losers. Homeless, useless and pointless. ROTFLMAO!!!!!!!!!!! Sully
